snippet: Ari Noe, one of the mayor’s backers in the Orthodox Jewish community, started a 15-day sentence nearly three years after his conviction for forcible touching.
abstract: Ari Noe surrenders in Manhattan Criminal Court to serve 15-day sentence for misdemeanor sexual abuse; Noe, leading supporter of New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio in Orthodox Jewish community, was convicted of forcibly touching woman in Upper West Side bar in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Ari Noe, one of the mayor’s backers in the Orthodox Jewish community, started a 15-day sentence nearly three years after his conviction for forcible touching.

headline.main: De Blasio Supporter Convicted of Sexual Abuse Begins Jail Term
headline.print_headline: Backer of Mayor Begins Jail Term
